bug.short_desc: Cleanup: Review and remove TODO comments in Code

long_desc.thetext:
We have a lot of "TODO" comments in the qooxdoo code. These comments should only be in the code, when a developer is actively working on the related problem. For all other To-do that are enhancements, possible bug hints, nice to have features, etc., please open a bug report or rephrase the comment.
Every responsible developer should review and remove the To-do comments when they do not satisfy the above description of a valid To-do.
Here is the maintainer overview:
http://qooxdoo.org/project/maintainer

We should pass around the bug and everyone should check the area hes responsible for for ToDo's and remove them (fix or move them into separate bugs). If everyone done with it reports in the comment, we can get it done fast. I would prefer to get the bug as last one to see whats left.

I'm mostly done with my applications and framework components, there's just a few sub-namespaces I'm not familiar enough with:
qx.lang.normalize.Function -> Martin qx.bom.element.Flash -> Chris qx.bom.Selection, qx.bom.htmlarea.* -> Alex

Removed some of the. Other need some more review and thats out of scope for the upcoming release.
